query: create or replace view `dfs`.`AAR  Views`.DELTA_function_point as SELECT    fp.snapshot,    fp.snapshot_date,    fp.snapshot_order,    fp.snapshot_td,    fp.appname,    fp.appResults.reference.name as measure_type,    fp.appResults.reference.shortName as measure_shortName,    fp.appResults.`result`.`value` as fp_value FROM (SELECT     fpj.number as snapshot,    DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY fpj.application.name ORDER BY fpj.number DESC) as snapshot_order,    fpj.`date`.isoDate as snapshot_date,    fpj.`date`.`time` AS snapshot_td,    fpj.application.name as appname,    FLATTEN(fpj.applicationResults) as appResults FROM `dfs`.`AAR  Inputs`.`./CLIENT-FP.json` as fpj) AS fp
